title: Portfolio
subtext: Further down, you can find the best projects that I have participated in order of importance.

contents.title: Bachelor Thesis
text: My Bachelor Thesis was composed during my Erasmus exchange on the subject of
"Measuring Parent Centrality in Java Packages". The supervisor was Prof. Paris Avgeriou
from the University of Groningen. In particular, the thesis implements a well-known metric among
software engineers, Parent Centrality, inside an existing tool, ASTracker.
Moreover, the paper interprets the results to conclude if this metric is useful.
Experts in software engineering are aware of the fact that inside the source code of a program,
some specific components may cause problems while maintaining or expanding it. Parent Centrality metric
that H. A. Al-Mutawa has proposed points out that if additional characteristics exist in these "harmful"
components, it turns them into "harmless" ones.
After analyzing a set of open-source Java projects, we confirmed H. A. Al-Mutawa's claim by matching our
results with his.

href.message: Please find my thesis file (only in english):

contents.title: Octopus
text: "Octopus" application is an incident management system geared towards small companies. Every user
is part of one or more groups in order to acquire specific capabilities inside the program. Furthermore,
users can perform, depending on their privileges, the actions below:
<ul>
• Incident and Request Management (Submission, Case Monitoring, Completion)
• Statistics Monitoring
• Chatting between Users
• Group and Privileges Creation
• Log Files Surveillance
It is offered as SaaS and was created using the "Laravel" programming language for advanced
security.
The application was built in collaboration with
Nikolaos Manoukidis.

href.message: Find more information about the project:

contents.title: On Duty Hospitals Website (Flask)
text: Bachelor level project during "Web Information Systems" course. The goal of the project is the creation
of a website, which represents in real time, all the on-duty hospitals of Greece, as well as their contact
details. Moreover, the user has the opportunity to find information about COVID-19.

href.message: Please, find more information about the project:

contents.title: PERT Diagram & Economic Analysis of Project
text: Bachelor level project during "Software Systems Quality Assurance" course. The goal of the project is
the designing of a PERT diagram showing the construction of a project, using given construction times of the
individual projects, as well as the analysis of the results.
The second exercise of the project refers to the selection and economic analysis of two big projects,
based on the "Return on Investment" value after 7 years.

href.message: Please find the pronunciation and the solution of the project (only in greek):

contents.title: Leakage Discovery in Manholes (CLIPS)
text: Bachelor level project during "Knowledge Systems" course. The goal of the project is the creation of an
expert system using CLIPS, which deduces the location of a malfunction at a factory from a series of
measurements, that are entered into the program. Moreover, it constructs a given topology of manholes and
warehouses, as well as the characteristics of some chemicals, so that the program comes to a reliable
conclusion.

href.message: Please, find more information about the project:

contents.title: Maze Solution (JADE)
text: Bachelor level project during "Multi-Agent Systems" course. The goal of the project is the creation of
a multi-agent system using JADE technology. The program implements a maze game, where "agents" of the
program are collaborating to find the exit. In order for the goal to be accomplished, the algorithms
"Best-First Search" and "A* Search" are, also, being used.

href.message: Please, find more information about the project:

contents.title: LateX Document Template
text: Document template in LaTeX, that is suitable for assignments, reports, theses, or similar papers that
are written in Greek.
"LaTeX is a high-quality typesetting system; it includes features designed for the production of technical
and scientific documentation. LaTeX is the de facto standard for the communication and publication of
scientific documents."
The LaTeX Project

contents.title: S-DES Algorithm Implementation (Python)
text: Bachelor level project during "Network Security" course. The goal of the project is the implementation of
the cryptography algorithm named S-DES. Also, the project includes the decoding procedure of a message.
